bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of nüe ji 瘧疾 , malaria ailment, associated with illness signs of the kidney conduits, such as fear of cold, difficult defecation, and pain in the back and lumbar region. Su wen 素問 36: 腎瘧者，令人洒洒然，腰脊痛宛轉，大便難 , “ Kidney malaria : it makes a person shiver. [Patients] writhe with pain in the lower back and spine. Defecation is difficult”.
